column6: Step into a world of extraordinary possibilities with the Redmi 13C – a smartphone that blends unmatched technology with creative brilliance. From capturing memories with artistic finesse to delivering immersive entertainment and powering through tasks effortlessly, this device is designed to complement your dynamic lifestyle. Redefine your smartphone experience with the Redmi 13C, where innovation meets imagination, and every feature is crafted to enhance your digital journey.
column21: 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.12 cm (6.74 inch) HD+ Display, 50MP Rear Camera | 8MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Helio G85 Processor
column78: The Redmi 13C takes your photography to new heights with its 50 MP AI Triple Camera. Immerse your images in a vintage vibe, courtesy of the 7 classic film filters. Every snapshot becomes a timeless masterpiece, capturing the essence of the moment in rich detail and artistic flair.
column79: Dive into a world of cinematic bliss with the 17.11 cm (6.74) display of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or simply browsing, the immersive display ensures a visual treat. Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay.
column80: Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 4 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly.
column81: Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed.
column82: Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade.
column83: Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.

column6: Smooth 5G connectivity is provided by the Redmi 13C 5G, allowing you lag-free video calls and streaming. Its striking Star Trail Design makes sure that you are seen. With the 50 MP AI Camera, take breathtaking pictures and infuse them with nostalgia through vintage film filters. With a refresh rate of 90 Hz, the 17.11 cm (6.74) display offers an immersive viewing experience. With the help of the Dimensity 6100+, it operates really quickly. You won't run out of space with 256 GB of extendable storage and up to 16 GB of RAM. Your phone is always fully charged thanks to the 18 W fast charging and 5000 mAh battery, and it is safe and convenient to use thanks to the Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner.
column21: 4 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 17.12 cm (6.74 inch) HD+ Display, 50MP Rear Camera | 5MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ Processor
column49: 50 MP AI Camera with Classic Film Filters
column52: Up to 16 GB RAM and 256 GB UFS 2.2 Storage
column53: Be 5G Fast and Look Good All Day Long
column78: Use the Redmi 13C 5G to fully experience the power of a 5G connection. Thanks to this innovative technology, you can watch cricket matches, view YouTube videos, and conduct video chats without experiencing any latency. 5G speed lets you stay connected and enjoy flawless streaming and browsing experiences no matter where you are, so say goodbye to buffering and delayed downloads.
column79: The Redmi 13C 5G's breathtaking Star Trail Design, stand out from the crowd. You will always be the centre of attention thanks to its striking design. When light falls on the phone, the distinctive design comes to life and gives the impression of star trails, which adds a touch of refinement and elegance. With a phone that looks as good as it works, you can move quickly and stylishly.
column80: Enjoy every moment in breathtaking detail thanks to the Redmi 13C 5G's 50 MP AI Camera. This strong camera makes sure that your pictures are crisp and colourful day or night. Your picture is improved by the AI's ability to automatically modify settings to suit varying lighting situations. You may also give your images a vintage feel with the classic film filters, which give you the creative control to guide your own memories.
column81: Enjoy your favourite material to the fullest on the Redmi 13C 5G's expansive 17.11 cm (6.74) display. This large screen makes for an engrossing visual experience, making it ideal for watching films, TV series, and videos. Every game you play will run smoothly at a refresh rate of 90 Hz, giving you a competitive advantage with quicker, more responsive gaming. Take enjoyment in vibrant images and seamless transitions that enhance every phone connection.
column82: The Dimensity 6100+ CPU, which powers the Redmi 13C 5G, offers lightning-fast performance. This CPU manages everything with ease, whether you're multitasking between applications, browsing social media, or playing graphics-intensive games. Take advantage of lag-free, efficient performance that enables you to do more. With the Dimensity 6100+, your phone will always be prepared to keep up with your hectic schedule.
column83: With the Redmi 13C 5G, you never have to worry about running out of space. Up to 16 GB of RAM makes multitasking fluid and makes it easy to switch between programmes. You have plenty of room on the 256 GB UFS 2.2 storage to keep all of your files, including movies and memories. Additionally, you can increase storage up to 1 TB via the dedicated SIM card, so you'll always have enough room for your digital life.
column84: The Redmi 13C 5G boasts endurance in addition to quickness. With a 5000 mAh battery, you can continue through the day without worrying about needing to recharge frequently since you will always be charged up. With the 18 W rapid charging (10 W charger that comes in the package), you can refuel your phone fast and resume your favourite activities. Maintain your connection and take full most of your smartphone experience.
column85: The Redmi 13C 5G's Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner combines security and ease of use. With this function, you can be confident that your phone is always private and only available to you. You may quickly and securely unlock your phone with a single touch, protecting your sensitive data and providing you with peace of mind.

column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

column6: Discover the Redmi Note 13 5G, a smartphone that raises the bar on performance. Enjoy a visual feast with its breathtaking 16.94 cm AMOLED display and slim bezel. Take pleasure in fluid interactions on the incredibly smooth 120 Hz screen, which is complemented by the slimmest Redmi Note to date with a 7.6 mm profile. Durability is guaranteed with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, which is enhanced with an IP54 grade for further security. With the 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment. The MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU powers lightning-fast 5G performance. Stays charged all day with a 5000 mAh battery and 33 W quick charging. Experience mobile at its finest with the Redmi Note 13 5G, where innovation and quality collide.
column21: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Full HD+ Display, 108MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 6080 Processor
column78: The days of having your vision obscured by a big bezel are long gone. The Redmi Note 13 5G immerses you in every moment, whether you're streaming your favourite programme or conquering a new mobile game, thanks to its amazing 93.3% screen-to-body ratio. Envision being engrossed in the activity, with nothing to divert your attention from the striking spectacle in front of you.
column79: The captivating images on the Redmi Note 13 5G's 16.94 cm (6.67) AMOLED display will enthral you. The very small bezel guarantee that every scene is rendered with unmatched depth and clarity. The AMOLED technology provides an absolutely amazing experience, whether you're exploring a virtual world or binge-watching your favourite series. Additionally, you can navigate precisely even with moist fingertips from an unexpected downpour or a refreshing drink thanks to optimised touch recognition.
column80: The ultra-smooth 120 Hz display of the Redmi Note 13 5G combines elegance with smoothness. The high refresh rate ensures that every swipe, scroll, and press is silky smooth. Say goodbye to jerky animations and sluggish transitions. The 120 Hz display makes sure that every interaction is smooth and seamless, whether you're playing intense games or multitasking like a pro.
column81: With its newfound slimness, reduced weight, and elegant design, the Redmi Note 13 5G is a real featherweight champion. Its sleek profile and ergonomic design defy expectations, weighing only 173.5 g and measuring just 7.6 mm thin. Whether you hold it in your hand or slip it into your pocket, you'll be grateful for its smoothness every time you reach for it.
column82: Although accidents may happen, the display of your Redmi Note 13 5G is always safe with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Bid farewell to the unsightly cracks and scratches - this very resilient glass is designed to endure the stresses of regular usage, giving you peace of mind that your screen is secure.
column83: With the Redmi Note 13 5G's 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment in breathtaking detail. Every picture, whether it's a candid portrait or an amazing scenery, has the potential to be a masterpiece. Furthermore, you can zoom in without sacrificing clarity thanks to the 3X in-sensor zoom, guaranteeing that every detail is captured for future generations.
column84: With the lightning-fast speed of the Redmi Note 13 5G, discover the power of 5G. Unmatched speed and responsiveness are provided by the MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU, whether you're streaming, gaming, or multitasking. Additionally, you can make use of all the advantages of 5G without compromising battery life thanks to MediaTek 5G UltraSave technology. This puts the best of both worlds right at your fingertips.
column85: With its 5000 mAh battery and 33 W rapid charging, the Redmi Note 13 5G combines power and ease. You can quickly replenish your battery with rapid charging and resume your favourite activities. Additionally, you won't ever have to worry about running out of power because of the enormous 5000 mAh capacity.

column6: Discover the Redmi Note 13 5G, a smartphone that raises the bar on performance. Enjoy a visual feast with its breathtaking 16.94 cm AMOLED display and slim bezel. Take pleasure in fluid interactions on the incredibly smooth 120 Hz screen, which is complemented by the slimmest Redmi Note to date with a 7.6 mm profile. Durability is guaranteed with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, which is enhanced with an IP54 grade for further security. With the 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment. The MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU powers lightning-fast 5G performance. Stays charged all day with a 5000 mAh battery and 33 W quick charging. Experience mobile at its finest with the Redmi Note 13 5G, where innovation and quality collide.
column21: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 108MP Rear Camera, 5000 mAh Battery
column78: The days of having your vision obscured by a big bezel are long gone. The Redmi Note 13 5G immerses you in every moment, whether you're streaming your favourite programme or conquering a new mobile game, thanks to its amazing 93.3% screen-to-body ratio. Envision being engrossed in the activity, with nothing to divert your attention from the striking spectacle in front of you.
column79: The captivating images on the Redmi Note 13 5G's 16.94 cm (6.67) AMOLED display will enthral you. The very small bezel guarantee that every scene is rendered with unmatched depth and clarity. The AMOLED technology provides an absolutely amazing experience, whether you're exploring a virtual world or binge-watching your favourite series. Additionally, you can navigate precisely even with moist fingertips from an unexpected downpour or a refreshing drink thanks to optimised touch recognition.
column80: The ultra-smooth 120 Hz display of the Redmi Note 13 5G combines elegance with smoothness. The high refresh rate ensures that every swipe, scroll, and press is silky smooth. Say goodbye to jerky animations and sluggish transitions. The 120 Hz display makes sure that every interaction is smooth and seamless, whether you're playing intense games or multitasking like a pro.
column81: With its newfound slimness, reduced weight, and elegant design, the Redmi Note 13 5G is a real featherweight champion. Its sleek profile and ergonomic design defy expectations, weighing only 173.5 g and measuring just 7.6 mm thin. Whether you hold it in your hand or slip it into your pocket, you'll be grateful for its smoothness every time you reach for it.
column82: Although accidents may happen, the display of your Redmi Note 13 5G is always safe with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Bid farewell to the unsightly cracks and scratches - this very resilient glass is designed to endure the stresses of regular usage, giving you peace of mind that your screen is secure.
column83: With the Redmi Note 13 5G's 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment in breathtaking detail. Every picture, whether it's a candid portrait or an amazing scenery, has the potential to be a masterpiece. Furthermore, you can zoom in without sacrificing clarity thanks to the 3X in-sensor zoom, guaranteeing that every detail is captured for future generations.
column84: With the lightning-fast speed of the Redmi Note 13 5G, discover the power of 5G. Unmatched speed and responsiveness are provided by the MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU, whether you're streaming, gaming, or multitasking. Additionally, you can make use of all the advantages of 5G without compromising battery life thanks to MediaTek 5G UltraSave technology. This puts the best of both worlds right at your fingertips.
column85: With its 5000 mAh battery and 33 W rapid charging, the Redmi Note 13 5G combines power and ease. You can quickly replenish your battery with rapid charging and resume your favourite activities. Additionally, you won't ever have to worry about running out of power because of the enormous 5000 mAh capacity.

column78: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. This octa-core powerhouse not only ensures superior performance but also brings remarkable improvements in graphics rendering, setting a new benchmark for mobile processing.
column81: Experience crystal-clear clarity and immerse yourself in the super smooth and sharp visuals on the 120Hz CrystalRes 1.5K display on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G with 94% screen-to-body ratio.
column82: The display is fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), making the SuperNote scratch-resistant. Elegance meets endurance in a display that stands the test of time.
column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that one touch is all you need to make things happen. Your smartphone experience just got more seamless and secure.
column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. Moreover, it is IP54-rated, ensuring a note-worthy experience that stands up to the rigours of daily use.

column78: The days of having your vision obscured by a big bezel are long gone. column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. column84: With the lightning-fast speed of the Redmi Note 13 5G, discover the power of 5G. column78: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. This octa-core powerhouse not only ensures superior performance but also brings remarkable improvements in graphics rendering, setting a new benchmark for mobile processing.
column81: Experience crystal-clear clarity and immerse yourself in the super smooth and sharp visuals on the 120Hz CrystalRes 1.5K display on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G with 94% screen-to-body ratio.
column82: The display is fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), making the SuperNote scratch-resistant. Elegance meets endurance in a display that stands the test of time.
column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that one touch is all you need to make things happen. Your smartphone experience just got more seamless and secure.
column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. Moreover, it is IP54-rated, ensuring a note-worthy experience that stands up to the rigours of daily use.

column6: Showcasing the Redmi A3X: a stylish and innovative device. It is a visual joy thanks to its innovative premium Halo design and thin 8.3mm flat frame. Experience a cinematic display on this huge 17.04 cm (6.71) screen with a smooth refresh rate of 90 Hz and Corning Gorilla Glass protection. Safe and rapid access is guaranteed by the Face Unlock feature and the side-mounted fingerprint scanner. Multitasking and storage are effortless with up to 128 GB of extendable storage and 4 GB of RAM (plus 4 GB of virtual RAM). With the 8 MP AI dual camera and vintage film filters, you may take beautiful pictures. Powered by a Type-C charger and a 5000 mAh battery, you can use it all day. Take pleasure in superiority with the Redmi A3X.

column78: The Redmi A3X is distinguished by its innovative premium Halo design. The center's well-placed circular camera deco enhances the circle's aesthetic harmony. This design embodies the spirit of exceptional craftsmanship and is more than just visually pleasing. The design's remarkable temperament, which offers a visually pleasing experience that is both smart and beautiful, displays a dedication to perfection. The Redmi A3X is a work of art that seamlessly blends practicality and artistic design at every angle.
column79: A technical wonder, the Redmi A3X is only 8.3 mm thick. The superior flat frame design and slender profile of the smartphone make it both visually pleasing and comfortable to carry. It is a unique gadget from every viewpoint thanks to its sleek and contemporary design, which also increases its visual appeal. There will be heads turning whether you pull the Redmi A3X out of your pocket or set it on a table because of its exquisite elegance.
column80: Take in a world of vibrant colours and breathtaking images on the Redmi A3X's big 17.04 cm (6.71) display. This large screen, whether you're watching movies, playing games or surfing the web, draws you in straight away with its 500 nits (HBM) of brightness. The striking display size makes sure that every detail is incredibly clear, offering an unmatched cinematic experience. With the Redmi A3X, routine chores become amazing experiences that enhance the fun and engagement of entertainment.
column81: With the Redmi A3X's flawless performance and its smooth 90 Hz refresh rate, say goodbye to latency. The seamless experience of this high refresh rate screen makes online surfing, casual gaming, and social media browsing more responsive and fluid. Your engagement with the device is elevated by the improved refresh rate, which guarantees that every swipe, scroll, and tap is met with prompt and seamless response. The Redmi A3X provides a responsive and enjoyable experience whether you're using applications or playing your favourite games.
column82: The Redmi A3X combines beauty and durability with its Corning Gorilla Glass protection. You may feel secure knowing that your smartphone is protected from drops and scratches with this sturdy glass cover, giving you peace of mind while going about your daily business. You can carry your Redmi A3X with confidence owing to its strong build, which ensures that it is well-protected from the rigours of daily usage. The power and design of the Redmi A3X combine to make it a dependable partner for your mobile lifestyle.
column83: With the Redmi A3X, ease and security go hand in hand. Compared to rear-mounted scanners, this creative design's side-mounted fingerprint scanner integrated into the power button provides a more comfortable and effective unlocking experience. Furthermore, the Face Unlock function adds an additional degree of ease and security by enabling you to rapidly unlock your phone simply by staring at it. These cutting-edge security technologies speed up and simplify device access while guaranteeing the safety of your personal data.
column84: With the Redmi A3X, you may enjoy better and quicker performance because of its outstanding 4 GB of RAM and up to 4 GB of virtual RAM. This combination makes sure that applications function flawlessly and offer a responsive and smooth user experience. The Redmi A3X manages everything with ease, whether you're playing games, watching movies, or multitasking. With enough RAM, switching between activities is a breeze, which makes the Redmi A3X an extremely productive device.
column85: With the Redmi A3X, you never have to worry about running out of space. With an impressive 1 TB of expandable internal storage and up to 128 GB of available storage, this smartphone has more than enough room for all of your movies, TV shows, applications, and other media. You can keep your favourite movies and apps close at hand thanks to the large storage capacity, which guarantees you have enough space for all of your digital material. The Redmi A3X is the ideal gadget for productivity and enjoyment since it's made to fit your expanding digital collection.
column86: With the 8 MP AI dual camera on the Redmi A3X, you can capture the world in breathtaking detail. With this camera system, you can easily make artistic and visually captivating images since it comes with a range of historical film filters. Capturing candid moments, landscapes, or portraits—the Redmi A3X guarantees that every photo is flawless. The AI improvements take your photography to a new level by producing pictures of expert quality that are perfect for sharing and preserving.
column87: With the Redmi A3X's robust 5000 mAh battery, you can stay occupied and connected for longer. With its long-lasting battery, you can watch movies, make video calls, and browse the internet for hours at a time without having to constantly recharge. Spend less time plugged in and more time using your gadget thanks to the quick and effective 10 W Type-C charger that comes with it. Designed to keep up with your hectic lifestyle, the Redmi A3X delivers dependable power all day long.

You can keep your favourite movies and apps close at hand thanks to the large storage capacity, which guarantees you have enough space for all of your digital material. The Redmi A3X is the ideal gadget for productivity and enjoyment since it's made to fit your expanding digital collection.
column86: With the 8 MP AI dual camera on the Redmi A3X, you can capture the world in breathtaking detail. With this camera system, you can easily make artistic and visually captivating images since it comes with a range of historical film filters. Capturing candid moments, landscapes, or portraits—the Redmi A3X guarantees that every photo is flawless. The AI improvements take your photography to a new level by producing pictures of expert quality that are perfect for sharing and preserving.
column87: With the Redmi A3X's robust 5000 mAh battery, you can stay occupied and connected for longer. With its long-lasting battery, you can watch movies, make video calls, and browse the internet for hours at a time without having to constantly recharge. Spend less time plugged in and more time using your gadget thanks to the quick and effective 10 W Type-C charger that comes with it. Designed to keep up with your hectic lifestyle, the Redmi A3X delivers dependable power all day long.

column6: Discover the Redmi Note 13 5G, a smartphone that raises the bar on performance. Enjoy a visual feast with its breathtaking 16.94 cm AMOLED display and slim bezel. Take pleasure in fluid interactions on the incredibly smooth 120 Hz screen, which is complemented by the slimmest Redmi Note to date with a 7.6 mm profile. Durability is guaranteed with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, which is enhanced with an IP54 grade for further security. With the 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment. The MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU powers lightning-fast 5G performance. Stays charged all day with a 5000 mAh battery and 33 W quick charging. Experience mobile at its finest with the Redmi Note 13 5G, where innovation and quality collide.
column21: 12 GB RAM | 256 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 108MP Rear Camera, 5000 mAh Battery
column78: The days of having your vision obscured by a big bezel are long gone. The Redmi Note 13 5G immerses you in every moment, whether you're streaming your favourite programme or conquering a new mobile game, thanks to its amazing 93.3% screen-to-body ratio. Envision being engrossed in the activity, with nothing to divert your attention from the striking spectacle in front of you.
column79: The captivating images on the Redmi Note 13 5G's 16.94 cm (6.67) AMOLED display will enthral you. The very small bezel guarantee that every scene is rendered with unmatched depth and clarity. The AMOLED technology provides an absolutely amazing experience, whether you're exploring a virtual world or binge-watching your favourite series. Additionally, you can navigate precisely even with moist fingertips from an unexpected downpour or a refreshing drink thanks to optimised touch recognition.
column80: The ultra-smooth 120 Hz display of the Redmi Note 13 5G combines elegance with smoothness. The high refresh rate ensures that every swipe, scroll, and press is silky smooth. Say goodbye to jerky animations and sluggish transitions. The 120 Hz display makes sure that every interaction is smooth and seamless, whether you're playing intense games or multitasking like a pro.
column81: With its newfound slimness, reduced weight, and elegant design, the Redmi Note 13 5G is a real featherweight champion. Its sleek profile and ergonomic design defy expectations, weighing only 173.5 g and measuring just 7.6 mm thin. Whether you hold it in your hand or slip it into your pocket, you'll be grateful for its smoothness every time you reach for it.
column82: Although accidents may happen, the display of your Redmi Note 13 5G is always safe with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Bid farewell to the unsightly cracks and scratches - this very resilient glass is designed to endure the stresses of regular usage, giving you peace of mind that your screen is secure.
column83: With the Redmi Note 13 5G's 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment in breathtaking detail. Every picture, whether it's a candid portrait or an amazing scenery, has the potential to be a masterpiece. Furthermore, you can zoom in without sacrificing clarity thanks to the 3X in-sensor zoom, guaranteeing that every detail is captured for future generations.
column84: With the lightning-fast speed of the Redmi Note 13 5G, discover the power of 5G. Unmatched speed and responsiveness are provided by the MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU, whether you're streaming, gaming, or multitasking. Additionally, you can make use of all the advantages of 5G without compromising battery life thanks to MediaTek 5G UltraSave technology. This puts the best of both worlds right at your fingertips.
column85: With its 5000 mAh battery and 33 W rapid charging, the Redmi Note 13 5G combines power and ease. You can quickly replenish your battery with rapid charging and resume your favourite activities. Additionally, you won't ever have to worry about running out of power because of the enormous 5000 mAh capacity.

column78: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. This octa-core powerhouse not only ensures superior performance but also brings remarkable improvements in graphics rendering, setting a new benchmark for mobile processing.
column81: Experience crystal-clear clarity and immerse yourself in the super smooth and sharp visuals on the 120Hz CrystalRes 1.5K display on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G with 94% screen-to-body ratio.
column82: The display is fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), making the SuperNote scratch-resistant. Elegance meets endurance in a display that stands the test of time.
column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that one touch is all you need to make things happen. Your smartphone experience just got more seamless and secure.
column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. Moreover, it is IP54-rated, ensuring a note-worthy experience that stands up to the rigours of daily use.

column78: Step into a world of elegance with the Redmi A3's Premium Halo Design. Aesthetically pleasing and ergonomically crafted, this design ensures you look great and distinctive in any crowd. The choice of three beautiful colours allows you to personalise your device to match your unique style. Choose the sophisticated leather-texture Olive Green for a touch of luxury, or opt for the classic glass designs of Lake Blue and Midnight Black, each radiating its own charm.
column79: The Redmi A3 sets a new standard with its 90 Hz smooth display. Everything on your screen becomes buttery smooth, from scrolling through your favourite social media apps to indulging in 90 Hz gaming on supported games. The higher refresh rate not only enhances your visual experience but also ensures a seamless and responsive interaction with your device.
column80: Get ready for a grand entertainment experience with the Redmi A3's expansive 17.01 cm (6.71) display boasting HD resolution. Immerse yourself in a world of vivid colours, sharp details, and cinematic clarity as you enjoy your favourite content on a screen designed for maximum impact.
column81: Worried about accidental scratches and drops? Fear not! The Redmi A3's display is fortified with Corning Gorilla Glass 3, providing robust protection against the perils of everyday use. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your device is shielded by industry-leading glass technology.
column82: Experience swift and secure unlocking with the Redmi A3's integrated side fingerprint scanner. Strategically placed on the frame for quick access, the fingerprint sensor ensures a seamless and reliable unlock experience, putting your device at your fingertips in an instant.
column83: Multitasking reaches new heights with the Redmi A3's powerful RAM configuration. With up to 6 GB of RAM and an additional 6 GB of Virtual RAM, the device handles multiple applications and processes with unparalleled efficiency. Say goodbye to lags and delays as you seamlessly switch between tasks.
column84: Never worry about running out of storage again. The Redmi A3 offers up to 128 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for your photos, videos, and apps. Need more room? column85: Capture stunning photos with the Redmi A3's 8MP AI Dual Camera equipped with film-camera filters. Add a touch of creativity to your shots and infuse them with a cool vibe, making every photo a work of art. Elevate your photography game with features designed to unleash your creativity.
column86: Unleash the power of longevity with the Redmi A3's 5000 mAh battery. Enjoy extended hours of video watching, music listening, and more without constantly worrying about charging. column6: The Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G is a symphony of innovation, luxury, and power. With Fusion Design, a 3D Curved AMOLED Display, In-Display Fingerprint Sensor, Sharp 1.5K Resolution, Flagship IP68 Protection, Elegance Meets Endurance, True 200 MP With OIS, 120 W HyperCharge, and the Global Debut of the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G, this SuperNote transcends the realm of smartphones. It's a masterpiece that blends art and technology seamlessly, offering an unparalleled experience that goes beyond expectations. Elevate your mobile journey with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G – where innovation meets perfection.
column21: 12 GB RAM | 512 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 7200 Ultra 5G Processor
column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

column6: Smooth 5G connectivity is provided by the Redmi 13C 5G, allowing you lag-free video calls and streaming. Its striking Star Trail Design makes sure that you are seen. With the 50 MP AI Camera, take breathtaking pictures and infuse them with nostalgia through vintage film filters. With a refresh rate of 90 Hz, the 17.11 cm (6.74) display offers an immersive viewing experience. With the help of the Dimensity 6100+, it operates really quickly. You won't run out of space with 256 GB of extendable storage and up to 16 GB of RAM. Your phone is always fully charged thanks to the 18 W fast charging and 5000 mAh battery, and it is safe and convenient to use thanks to the Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner.

column78: Use the Redmi 13C 5G to fully experience the power of a 5G connection. Thanks to this innovative technology, you can watch cricket matches, view YouTube videos, and conduct video chats without experiencing any latency. 5G speed lets you stay connected and enjoy flawless streaming and browsing experiences no matter where you are, so say goodbye to buffering and delayed downloads.
column79: The Redmi 13C 5G's breathtaking Star Trail Design, stand out from the crowd. You will always be the centre of attention thanks to its striking design. When light falls on the phone, the distinctive design comes to life and gives the impression of star trails, which adds a touch of refinement and elegance. With a phone that looks as good as it works, you can move quickly and stylishly.
column80: Enjoy every moment in breathtaking detail thanks to the Redmi 13C 5G's 50 MP AI Camera. This strong camera makes sure that your pictures are crisp and colourful day or night. Your picture is improved by the AI's ability to automatically modify settings to suit varying lighting situations. You may also give your images a vintage feel with the classic film filters, which give you the creative control to guide your own memories.
column81: Enjoy your favourite material to the fullest on the Redmi 13C 5G's expansive 17.11 cm (6.74) display. This large screen makes for an engrossing visual experience, making it ideal for watching films, TV series, and videos. Every game you play will run smoothly at a refresh rate of 90 Hz, giving you a competitive advantage with quicker, more responsive gaming. Take enjoyment in vibrant images and seamless transitions that enhance every phone connection.
column82: The Dimensity 6100+ CPU, which powers the Redmi 13C 5G, offers lightning-fast performance. This CPU manages everything with ease, whether you're multitasking between applications, browsing social media, or playing graphics-intensive games. Take advantage of lag-free, efficient performance that enables you to do more. With the Dimensity 6100+, your phone will always be prepared to keep up with your hectic schedule.
column83: With the Redmi 13C 5G, you never have to worry about running out of space. Up to 16 GB of RAM makes multitasking fluid and makes it easy to switch between programmes. You have plenty of room on the 256 GB UFS 2.2 storage to keep all of your files, including movies and memories. Additionally, you can increase storage up to 1 TB via the dedicated SIM card, so you'll always have enough room for your digital life.
column84: The Redmi 13C 5G boasts endurance in addition to quickness. With a 5000 mAh battery, you can continue through the day without worrying about needing to recharge frequently since you will always be charged up. With the 18 W rapid charging (10 W charger that comes in the package), you can refuel your phone fast and resume your favourite activities. Maintain your connection and take full most of your smartphone experience.
column85: The Redmi 13C 5G's Quick Unlock Fingerprint Scanner combines security and ease of use. With this function, you can be confident that your phone is always private and only available to you. You may quickly and securely unlock your phone with a single touch, protecting your sensitive data and providing you with peace of mind.

column78: Step into a world of elegance with the Redmi A3's Premium Halo Design. Aesthetically pleasing and ergonomically crafted, this design ensures you look great and distinctive in any crowd. The choice of three beautiful colours allows you to personalise your device to match your unique style. Choose the sophisticated leather-texture Olive Green for a touch of luxury, or opt for the classic glass designs of Lake Blue and Midnight Black, each radiating its own charm.
column79: The Redmi A3 sets a new standard with its 90 Hz smooth display. Everything on your screen becomes buttery smooth, from scrolling through your favourite social media apps to indulging in 90 Hz gaming on supported games. The higher refresh rate not only enhances your visual experience but also ensures a seamless and responsive interaction with your device.
column80: Get ready for a grand entertainment experience with the Redmi A3's expansive 17.01 cm (6.71) display boasting HD resolution. Immerse yourself in a world of vivid colours, sharp details, and cinematic clarity as you enjoy your favourite content on a screen designed for maximum impact.
column81: Worried about accidental scratches and drops? Fear not! The Redmi A3's display is fortified with Corning Gorilla Glass 3, providing robust protection against the perils of everyday use. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your device is shielded by industry-leading glass technology.
column82: Experience swift and secure unlocking with the Redmi A3's integrated side fingerprint scanner. Strategically placed on the frame for quick access, the fingerprint sensor ensures a seamless and reliable unlock experience, putting your device at your fingertips in an instant.
column83: Multitasking reaches new heights with the Redmi A3's powerful RAM configuration. With up to 6 GB of RAM and an additional 6 GB of Virtual RAM, the device handles multiple applications and processes with unparalleled efficiency. Say goodbye to lags and delays as you seamlessly switch between tasks.
column84: Never worry about running out of storage again. The Redmi A3 offers up to 128 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for your photos, videos, and apps. Need more room? Expand your storage up to a whopping 1 TB with the dedicated microSD card slot, ensuring you have all the space you need for your digital life.
column85: Capture stunning photos with the Redmi A3's 8MP AI Dual Camera equipped with film-camera filters. Add a touch of creativity to your shots and infuse them with a cool vibe, making every photo a work of art. Elevate your photography game with features designed to unleash your creativity.
column86: Unleash the power of longevity with the Redmi A3's 5000 mAh battery. Enjoy extended hours of video watching, music listening, and more without constantly worrying about charging. The device comes equipped with a 10 W Type-C charger in the box, ensuring a swift and convenient charging experience whenever you need it.

column6: The Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G is a symphony of innovation, luxury, and power. With Fusion Design, a 3D Curved AMOLED Display, In-Display Fingerprint Sensor, Sharp 1.5K Resolution, Flagship IP68 Protection, Elegance Meets Endurance, True 200 MP With OIS, 120 W HyperCharge, and the Global Debut of the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G, this SuperNote transcends the realm of smartphones. It's a masterpiece that blends art and technology seamlessly, offering an unparalleled experience that goes beyond expectations. Elevate your mobile journey with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G – where innovation meets perfection.
column21: 12 GB RAM | 512 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 7200 Ultra 5G Processor
column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

column6: The Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G is a symphony of innovation, luxury, and power. With Fusion Design, a 3D Curved AMOLED Display, In-Display Fingerprint Sensor, Sharp 1.5K Resolution, Flagship IP68 Protection, Elegance Meets Endurance, True 200 MP With OIS, 120 W HyperCharge, and the Global Debut of the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G, this SuperNote transcends the realm of smartphones. It's a masterpiece that blends art and technology seamlessly, offering an unparalleled experience that goes beyond expectations. Elevate your mobile journey with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G – where innovation meets perfection.
column21: 8 GB RAM | 256 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 7200 Ultra 5G Processor
column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

column78: Step into a world of elegance with the Redmi A3's Premium Halo Design. Aesthetically pleasing and ergonomically crafted, this design ensures you look great and distinctive in any crowd. The choice of three beautiful colours allows you to personalise your device to match your unique style. Choose the sophisticated leather-texture Olive Green for a touch of luxury, or opt for the classic glass designs of Lake Blue and Midnight Black, each radiating its own charm.
column79: The Redmi A3 sets a new standard with its 90 Hz smooth display. Everything on your screen becomes buttery smooth, from scrolling through your favourite social media apps to indulging in 90 Hz gaming on supported games. The higher refresh rate not only enhances your visual experience but also ensures a seamless and responsive interaction with your device.
column80: Get ready for a grand entertainment experience with the Redmi A3's expansive 17.01 cm (6.71) display boasting HD resolution. Immerse yourself in a world of vivid colours, sharp details, and cinematic clarity as you enjoy your favourite content on a screen designed for maximum impact.
column81: Worried about accidental scratches and drops? Fear not! The Redmi A3's display is fortified with Corning Gorilla Glass 3, providing robust protection against the perils of everyday use. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your device is shielded by industry-leading glass technology.
column82: Experience swift and secure unlocking with the Redmi A3's integrated side fingerprint scanner. Strategically placed on the frame for quick access, the fingerprint sensor ensures a seamless and reliable unlock experience, putting your device at your fingertips in an instant.
column83: Multitasking reaches new heights with the Redmi A3's powerful RAM configuration. With up to 6 GB of RAM and an additional 6 GB of Virtual RAM, the device handles multiple applications and processes with unparalleled efficiency. Say goodbye to lags and delays as you seamlessly switch between tasks.
column84: Never worry about running out of storage again. The Redmi A3 offers up to 128 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for your photos, videos, and apps. Need more room? Expand your storage up to a whopping 1 TB with the dedicated microSD card slot, ensuring you have all the space you need for your digital life.
column85: Capture stunning photos with the Redmi A3's 8MP AI Dual Camera equipped with film-camera filters. Add a touch of creativity to your shots and infuse them with a cool vibe, making every photo a work of art. Elevate your photography game with features designed to unleash your creativity.
column86: Unleash the power of longevity with the Redmi A3's 5000 mAh battery. Enjoy extended hours of video watching, music listening, and more without constantly worrying about charging. The device comes equipped with a 10 W Type-C charger in the box, ensuring a swift and convenient charging experience whenever you need it.

column78: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. This octa-core powerhouse not only ensures superior performance but also brings remarkable improvements in graphics rendering, setting a new benchmark for mobile processing.
column81: Experience crystal-clear clarity and immerse yourself in the super smooth and sharp visuals on the 120Hz CrystalRes 1.5K display on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G with 94% screen-to-body ratio.
column82: The display is fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), making the SuperNote scratch-resistant. Elegance meets endurance in a display that stands the test of time.
column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that one touch is all you need to make things happen. Your smartphone experience just got more seamless and secure.
column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. Moreover, it is IP54-rated, ensuring a note-worthy experience that stands up to the rigours of daily use.

Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay.
column80: Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 4 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly.
column81: Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed.
column82: Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade.
column83: Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.

column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

column21: 12 GB RAM | 512 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5000 mAh Battery, Dimensity 7200 Ultra 5G Processor
column78: Feel the opulence with the all-new Fusion Design on the SuperNote. Immerse yourself in the stunning vegan leather texture paired with a stylish colour-blocked pattern that elevates the aesthetics of the Redmi Note series to unparalleled heights. It's not just a smartphone; it's a fashion statement that mirrors your sense of style.
column79: Witness innovation unfolds with the introduction of the first-ever 3D curved display on the Redmi Note series. The 4-sided ultra-thin narrow bezel and a 25-degree curvature not only enhance the visual appeal but are meticulously designed for the perfect hand grip. Immerse yourself in a display that doesn't just meet expectations; it exceeds them.
column80: Experience the marriage of security and style with Redmi Note's first in-display fingerprint sensor. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that unlocking your device is not just secure but seamless. It's a touch of sophistication every time you access your smartphone.
column81: Elevate your visual experience with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's impressive 120Hz 1.5K resolution. Compared to a standard FHD display, this technology provides a much denser pixel-per-inch ratio, resulting in a sharper, visually pleasing experience. Immerse yourself in a world of clarity and vividness like never before.
column82: Fearlessly face the elements with the Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G's flagship IP68 protection. With 19 key structural components water-proofed, this smartphone reaches pro-grade protection against water and dust. Life's uncertainties are no match for the SuperNote – it's ready for whatever challenges come your way.
column83: The curved display on the SuperNote is not just a visual treat; it's fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), the toughest Gorilla(R) Glass yet. This makes the SuperNote twice as scratch-resistant as its predecessor, ensuring enduring elegance that stands the test of time.
column84: The new and improved flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3 with in-sensor 4X zoom and enhanced computing power gives you a flagship imaging experience, further enhancing the high-resolution experience.
column85: Fuel your day at the speed of thought with the SuperNote's 120 W HyperCharge. Witness a 100% charge in just 19 minutes. But it's not just about speed; it's about intelligent charging. Redmi's own smart charging engine optimises the charging process, ensuring efficiency and longevity for your device.
column86: Step into the future with the smartphone powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7200 Ultra-5G. Built on the flagship TSMC 4 nm process, the octa-core processor offers an improved performance. The SuperNote is not just powerful; it's cool too, thanks to advanced liquid cooling ensuring smooth operations even in demanding situations.

With an exquisite glass finish, MIUI Dialer, and a powerful 5000 mAh battery, this phone lets you stay productive all the time.

column78: Step into a world of elegance with the Redmi A3's Premium Halo Design. Aesthetically pleasing and ergonomically crafted, this design ensures you look great and distinctive in any crowd. The choice of three beautiful colours allows you to personalise your device to match your unique style. Choose the sophisticated leather-texture Olive Green for a touch of luxury, or opt for the classic glass designs of Lake Blue and Midnight Black, each radiating its own charm.
column79: The Redmi A3 sets a new standard with its 90 Hz smooth display. Everything on your screen becomes buttery smooth, from scrolling through your favourite social media apps to indulging in 90 Hz gaming on supported games. The higher refresh rate not only enhances your visual experience but also ensures a seamless and responsive interaction with your device.
column80: Get ready for a grand entertainment experience with the Redmi A3's expansive 17.01 cm (6.71) display boasting HD resolution. Immerse yourself in a world of vivid colours, sharp details, and cinematic clarity as you enjoy your favourite content on a screen designed for maximum impact.
column81: Worried about accidental scratches and drops? Fear not! The Redmi A3's display is fortified with Corning Gorilla Glass 3, providing robust protection against the perils of everyday use. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your device is shielded by industry-leading glass technology.
column82: Experience swift and secure unlocking with the Redmi A3's integrated side fingerprint scanner. Strategically placed on the frame for quick access, the fingerprint sensor ensures a seamless and reliable unlock experience, putting your device at your fingertips in an instant.
column83: Multitasking reaches new heights with the Redmi A3's powerful RAM configuration. With up to 6 GB of RAM and an additional 6 GB of Virtual RAM, the device handles multiple applications and processes with unparalleled efficiency. Say goodbye to lags and delays as you seamlessly switch between tasks.
column84: Never worry about running out of storage again. The Redmi A3 offers up to 128 GB of internal storage, providing ample space for your photos, videos, and apps. Need more room? Expand your storage up to a whopping 1 TB with the dedicated microSD card slot, ensuring you have all the space you need for your digital life.
column85: Capture stunning photos with the Redmi A3's 8MP AI Dual Camera equipped with film-camera filters. Add a touch of creativity to your shots and infuse them with a cool vibe, making every photo a work of art. Elevate your photography game with features designed to unleash your creativity.
column86: Unleash the power of longevity with the Redmi A3's 5000 mAh battery. Enjoy extended hours of video watching, music listening, and more without constantly worrying about charging. The device comes equipped with a 10 W Type-C charger in the box, ensuring a swift and convenient charging experience whenever you need it.

column6: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G is not just a smartphone; it's a testament to Xiaomi's commitment to innovation and user satisfaction. With its Pro design, pro camera setup, powerful processor, visual spectacle display, enduring elegance, seamless unlocking, rapid charging, and fan-favourite features, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G is the epitome of a next-gen smartphone. Elevate your mobile experience and make a statement with the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where perfection meets Pro.
column21: 8 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM, 16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Display, 200MP (OIS) + 8MP + 2MP | 16MP Front Camera, 5100 mAh Battery, 7s Gen 2 Mobile Platform 5G Processor
column78: The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G – where Pro meets perfection in design, camera prowess, and incredible technology. Prepare to be captivated by its all-new, double-sided glass body, featuring a super-narrow bezel, available in three elegant shades that redefine smartphone aesthetics.
column79: Now the Pro also gets the pro camera setup with the flagship 200MP ISOCELL HP3. Combined with Xiaomi's high-pixel engine, the flagship camera setup further enhances the high-resolution 200MP experience and in-sensor 4X zoom.
column80: Under the hood, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G proudly houses the world's first Snapdragon(R) 7s Gen 2 5G processor, built on a 4 nm architecture. This octa-core powerhouse not only ensures superior performance but also brings remarkable improvements in graphics rendering, setting a new benchmark for mobile processing.
column81: Experience crystal-clear clarity and immerse yourself in the super smooth and sharp visuals on the 120Hz CrystalRes 1.5K display on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G with 94% screen-to-body ratio.
column82: The display is fortified with Corning Gorilla(R) Glass Victus(R), making the SuperNote scratch-resistant. Elegance meets endurance in a display that stands the test of time.
column83: Unlock a world of possibilities with the in-display fingerprint sensor on the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G. This cutting-edge technology supports dark light unlocking and heart rate detection, ensuring that one touch is all you need to make things happen. Your smartphone experience just got more seamless and secure.
column84: Charging your device becomes a breeze with the 67 W Turbo Charge feature. Redmi's revolutionary charging technology not only juices up your smartphone at supersonic speeds, providing a full day's charge in just 19 minutes but is also backed by Redmi's smart charging engine. This engine optimises your charging needs, ensuring longevity and efficiency in every charge.
column85: Delight in fan-favourite features that enhance your overall smartphone experience. The Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G boasts dual stereo speakers for immersive audio, a 3.5 mm headphone jack for versatile connectivity, an X-axis motor for enhanced haptics, and an IR blaster for added convenience. Moreover, it is IP54-rated, ensuring a note-worthy experience that stands up to the rigours of daily use.

column78: The Redmi 13C takes your photography to new heights with its 50 MP AI Triple Camera. Immerse your images in a vintage vibe, courtesy of the 7 classic film filters. Every snapshot becomes a timeless masterpiece, capturing the essence of the moment in rich detail and artistic flair.
column79: Dive into a world of cinematic bliss with the 17.11 cm (6.74) display of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or simply browsing, the immersive display ensures a visual treat. Redefine your entertainment experience as games come to life with smoothness, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate that sets the stage for dynamic and responsive gameplay.
column80: Experience seamless multitasking like never before, courtesy of the fast MediaTek G85 Octa-Core Processor. Paired with a whopping 4 GB of RAM and a vast 128 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, the Redmi 13C transforms every task into a breeze. Say goodbye to lag and hello to efficiency as you navigate through applications, games, and multimedia effortlessly.
column81: Fuel your day with the robust 5000 mAh Battery of the Redmi 13C. Whether you're a power user or a casual smartphone enthusiast, this device keeps up with your pace. Bid farewell to battery anxiety, and embrace the freedom to go through your day without worrying about running out of charge. The 18 W fast charging capability ensures a quick boost whenever needed.
column82: Life is unpredictable, but your smartphone doesn't have to be. The Redmi 13C stands tall against everyday wear and tear, thanks to the robust Corning Gorilla Glass protecting its display. With splash and dust resistance, this phone becomes your reliable companion in any environment – be it a bustling city or an adventurous outdoor escapade.
column83: Security meets convenience with the Quick Unlock Fingerprint scanner of the Redmi 13C. Your smartphone is not just a device; it's an extension of yourself, secured by the unique imprint of your fingerprint. Access your world swiftly and securely, knowing that your privacy is in safe hands.
